EconoPET 40/8096 Rev. A

Open hardware CBM/PET mainboard replacement

The EconoPET can be used to repair or upgrade a Commodore PET/CBM 2001 / 30xx / 40xx or 80xx series machine. The EconoPET can also be used independently with an HDMI display and USB keyboard.
